item.title: PS0 Posted
item.description:
Problem Set 0: Getting Started

Hello students, Problem Set 0 is available here: ps0.pdf (you will also need the ps0.zip file described in the PDF).

The goal of this assignment is to get you acquainted with the tools we will be using for future assignments this semester: LaTeX (and overleaf) and Jupyter notebooks (using Python).

It is due on Friday, 6 September at 4:19pm.

Enjoy!

item.title: Course Registration Survey
item.description: Please complete the course registration survey by 4:19pm on Friday, August 30.
